name: Hungry Squirrel (Rainsong, jazzhoo)
description:
for Trijam 155:  Gameplay under 1 minute! (February 4-7, 2022)

You're a hungry squirrel trying to grab as many falling acorns as you can.

In this test-build, you can move all over with arrows or the usual letter keys. Any contact with an acorn catches it. The game ends when the timer runs out.

Inspired by a Russian handheld game in which a fox is catching eggs coming down chutes, and the player only has a set number of locations to teleport between. I am still working on duplicating the movement for that. Watch for Hungry Squirrel 2 with the correct motion, coming soon :) There wasn't any way to get that worked out in the time limit.

Art: Jazzhoo
Coding: Rainsong
